metadata.title: Belly Dancing Dance Waistband Hip Skirt Scarf with Multicolor Sequins
features: This scarf is a great addition to your Belly Dance workout.
Fashionable and charming design,A essential collection for dancing lovers.
The decor and sequin are eye catching and look great on troupes.
Perfect design for belly dancing,fancy dress,professional dance wear.
Product only include waist towel , which is not contain the pants.
description: Features: 100% brand new and high quality. Belly dance hip scarf waistband belt. This scarf is a great addition to your Belly Dance workout Fashionable and charming design,A essential collection for dancing lovers. The decor and sequin are eye catching and look great on troupes Perfect design for belly dancing,fancy dress,professional dance wear. Product only include waist towel , which is not contain the pants  Specifications:Gender: Women Item Type: Waistband Fit For: Belly Dancing Style: Fashion Material: Polyester+ Alloy+ Sequins Belt Length: 168cm/66.14 inch (With coins length:64cm/25.2inch. Fit for more than waist 60cm/23.62inch ) Width: 25cm/9.8 inch(with coins) Color: Black,Purple Package Weight:Approx.180g  Package includes: 1 x Belly Dance Belt  Notes:1.Item color displayed in photos may be showing slightly different on your computer monitor since monitors are not calibrated same.THANKS!
